channel.title: Authors on Schulich Ignite
channel.description: Recent content in Authors on Schulich Ignite

item.description: I’m a computer science major, with a minor in philosophy. I love to do open source work, especially in scripting, automation, web development, API’s, CLI’s and dev ops!
I’m a software engineering student in my last year. I have a passion for games and one day want to express my creativity as a game dev.
